post:
**Who are we?**

We are West Plains Hosting! We are happy to be posting our first offer on LET! We are headquartered in North Dakota (yes it's in the middle of nowhere and no we are not pretty much Canadians). We offer VPS and dedicated servers from our Atlanta location. As well as dedicated servers in Paris and Amsterdam. We are not a re-seller and own our equipment. We offer 24/7 support via ticket and phone. 

**Atlanta KVM Offers**

KVM1

1 Core
512MB ECC RAM
15GB HHD RAID 10 
Up to 200 Mbps Connection
1TB Bandwidth
1 IPv4 Address
1 IPv6 Address

[Only $1.50 a month with FREE instant set up!](https://clientarea.westplainshosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=29)

KVM2

1 Core
1GB ECC RAM
40GB HHD RAID 10 
Up to 200 Mbps Connection
3TB Bandwidth
1 IPv4 Address
1 IPv6 Address

[Only $3 a month with FREE instant set up!](https://clientarea.westplainshosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=30)

KVM3

2 Cores
1.5GB ECC RAM
60GB HHD RAID 10 
Up to 300 Mbps Connection
Unmetered Bandwidth*
1 IPv4 Address
1 IPv6 Address

[Only $5 a month with FREE instant set up!](https://clientarea.westplainshosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=31)

We except: Bitcoin, Paypal, and most Credit/Debit Cards, and song+dance.

To order visit [westplainshosting.com](https://westplainshosting.com/) or give us a call 1-855-888-8628


*Speeds may be lowered after 10TB depending on network demands.

Just like we say on our tinder profile if you read this far you deserve to get lucky. Use promo code: CLOUDMENEW for 15% off your first month.
